code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=_ref=>{let{onSubmit,initialTask}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[completed,setCompleted]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(initialTask){setTitle(initialTask.title);setDescription(initialTask.description);setCompleted(initialTask.completed);}},[initialTask]);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit({title,description,completed});setTitle('');setDescription('');setCompleted(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Completed:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:completed,onChange:e=>setCompleted(e.target.checked)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:initialTask?'Update Task':'Add Task'})]});};export default TaskForm;
